14090.「……ククク。そうだったのか。\n この修行をこなすとは やはり\n お前は ポ:
...Kukuku. Was that so? To complete this
training, you are Polfan's disciple after all.

14091.「オレも かつては あいつの弟子だった。\n 言うなれば お前の兄弟子ってとこだ:
I used to be his disciple. In other words, I
was your brother.

14092.「知ってるか？ <pc>。\n この修行をこなした奴だけが\n 伝説の旅芸人に:
Do you know? <pc>. Only those who
complete this training can come close to
becoming a legendary minstrel?

14093.「オレも 修行を終えたところだ。\n あの時は勝ちをゆずったが 今 この時におい:
I just finished my training. I gave up the win
then, but at this moment in time, you and I
are evenly matched.

14094.「フハハ！ オレは 誰にも止められねえ！\n いずれ最強となり 世の中から恐れら:
Ha-ha-ha! Nothing can stop me! I will become
the most powerful and legendary minstrel the
world has ever feared!

14095.「人を笑わせるだけで 満足してるような\n ふぬけた旅芸人をブッ殺してよおお！！:
Kill those minstrels who are content just to
make people laugh! I'll show the world that
tricks don't work!

14096.「……芸で 人なんか救えねえ。: You can't save people with tricks.

14097.「頭に たたきこんでおけ。<pc>。\n ポルファンは 人ひとり救えねえ クズ芸:
It is the only one for your head.
<pc>. Polfan is a scumbag comedian
who can't even save a single person.
